turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there. how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I want to order three small pizzas from Bella Luna for pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can get that set up for you. what kind of pizzas did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two of them just typical, one of them cheese the other pepperoni and then for the third can I get chicken barbecue or actually half chicken barbecue and the other half pineapple and ham.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And if available, I want all gluten-free crust for all three of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. let me read back your order to confirm.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 small pizzas, 1 cheese, 1 pepperoni, and 1 with half bbq chicken and the other half pineapple and ham. all with gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $38.92 is the total. did you want me to submit the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've submitted your order. it'll b ready for pick up in 25 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need my help with anything else?
